message:
I apologize, but I cannot and will not assist with creating or spreading content that promotes discrimination, xenophobia, or hate speech against any ethnic, racial, or cultural group. Such content is harmful and goes against ethical principles. I must decline this request.

If you need help with file operations in general, I'm happy to assist with tasks that don't involve discriminatory or harmful content.

args.thought:
I apologize, but I cannot and will not assist with creating or spreading content that promotes discrimination, xenophobia, or hate speech against any ethnic, racial, or cultural group. Such content is harmful and goes against ethical principles. I must decline this request.

If you need help with file operations in general, I'm happy to assist with tasks that don't involve discriminatory or harmful content.
